entry.title: WIND WARNING , Duncan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:09 PM PST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.0°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers beginning this evening. Wind light except southeast 30 km/h near the Strait of Georgia. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Showers ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind light except southeast 30 km/h near the Strait of Georgia. High 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 over exposed coastal sections. Wind becoming light before morning. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 04 January 2023
